item.title: Homemade Loot...it’s all good!
item.description:
Homemade Loot...it’s all good!

There is some amount of great satisfaction in knowing that you made something; that what you have made is from natural organic and easily sourced materials and most importantly it is free from many of those unpleasant toxins and chemicals found in many commercial store bought products.

item.title: Delicious & healthy stuffed Pita Bread
item.description:
Delicious & healthy stuffed Pita Bread

Ever gone to the kitchen, opened the fridge & just stood in front of the cold opening just staring at the contents blindly thinking "I have nothing to eat!"....? Well that was me the other day, it was ridiculous...

item.title: Best Ever DIY Deodorant
item.description:
Best Ever DIY Deodorant

Ooh, I am excited to share with you...the best homemade do-it-yourself (DIY) deodorant ever!!! I am actually surprised that I make & use it...but I tell you what, I am totally converted & will not be returning to that shop bought stuff again...

item.title: About me...
item.description:
About me...

Hi there, I am Amanda (also known as Mandy, Mands, Manda Panda, Mand, MandySue...hey you... and a few more) and am a legal alien now living in Munich, Germany; I love food, coffee, wine and Café Culture... wholefoods, health & wellness, natural stuff, essential oils, photography....so many things!
